Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: painting of a doorway to a tree

Crumbling in the foreground is a derelict wall, the tan stones succumbing to time. The sky in general is painted a gloomy grey, emphasizing the wall's decrepit state. A few sparse bunches of weeds sprout along the base of the wall but otherwise the ground is barren and cracked. In the center of the ruined wall a single doorway breaks up the gloom of the otherwise sad painting. The actual door is long gone and all that remains is the stone frame which is pointed at the top and tapers to a narrow opening. What hasn't fallen off in chunks or faded with time reveals intricate carvings gracing the edges of the frame. These faded carvings were once grand and elaborate artwork of Celtic knots but time and weather has not been kind. Through the doorway, in the distance, green grass is visible and a small tree-ling tries to reach for the sky. A single ray of sunshine lights up the entrance just beyond the ruin. A small red rose is settled at the base of the small tree-ling, a barely visible H is seen in the middle of it.
Painted in pastel colors is a doorway in a crumbing wall.

if(NRefOb(\$iob[0])."base:environment") \{ \$this."base:environment" = NRefOb(\$iob[0])."base:environment"; \} else \{ \$this."base:environment" = NRefOb(\$iob[0]); \} \$this."base:proximity" = \$iob[0]; \$this."base:stance" = 6; \$this."base:preposition" = 8; \} return TRUE;
